headline: Street Remains Confident in Arista Networks (ANET) Amid AI Infrastructure Build Cycle Acceleration
summary: Arista Networks, Inc. (NYSE:ANET) is one of the best stocks to buy right now. As of January 12, 2026, Arista Networks, Inc. (NYSE:ANET) holds a bullish stance from over 90% of analysts.
